++Documenting System

The Documenting System allows activities to be tracked. The DS works alongside [Logging] and allows more useful information to be added.

++User intervention

    * user changes some security options and attaches a document to the change to explain why
    * the user gives the label "i prefer this" to a change because they prefer it this way
    * user figures that the change makes some software work and is recorded and if the user supplies information why<![CDATA[</div>]]>
